<a id="class_RDFramebufferPass"></a>

# RDFramebufferPass

**Inherits:** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Framebuffer pass attachment description (used by [RenderingDevice](class_renderingdevice.md)).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This class contains the list of attachment descriptions for a framebuffer pass. Each points with an index to a previously supplied list of texture attachments.

Multipass framebuffers can optimize some configurations in mobile. On desktop, they provide little to no advantage.

This object is used by [RenderingDevice](class_renderingdevice.md).

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Constants

<a id="class_RDFramebufferPass_constant_ATTACHMENT_UNUSED"></a>

<!-- classref-constant -->

**ATTACHMENT_UNUSED** = `-1` [ðŸ”—](#class_RDFramebufferPass_constant_ATTACHMENT_UNUSED)

Attachment is unused.

<hr class="classref-section-separator">

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="class_RDFramebufferPass_property_color_attachments"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[PackedInt32Array](class_packedint32array.md) **color_attachments** = `PackedInt32Array()` [ðŸ”—](#class_RDFramebufferPass_property_color_attachments)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_color_attachments**\ (\ value\: [PackedInt32Array](class_packedint32array.md)\ )
- [PackedInt32Array](class_packedint32array.md) **get_color_attachments**\ (\ )

Color attachments in order starting from 0. If this attachment is not used by the shader, pass ATTACHMENT_UNUSED to skip.

**Note:** The returned array is *copied* and any changes to it will not update the original property value. See [PackedInt32Array](class_packedint32array.md) for more details.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_RDFramebufferPass_property_depth_attachment"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](class_int.md) **depth_attachment** = `-1` [ðŸ”—](#class_RDFramebufferPass_property_depth_attachment)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_depth_attachment**\ (\ value\: [int](class_int.md)\ )
- [int](class_int.md) **get_depth_attachment**\ (\ )

Depth attachment. ATTACHMENT_UNUSED should be used if no depth buffer is required for this pass.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_RDFramebufferPass_property_input_attachments"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[PackedInt32Array](class_packedint32array.md) **input_attachments** = `PackedInt32Array()` [ðŸ”—](#class_RDFramebufferPass_property_input_attachments)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_input_attachments**\ (\ value\: [PackedInt32Array](class_packedint32array.md)\ )
- [PackedInt32Array](class_packedint32array.md) **get_input_attachments**\ (\ )

Used for multipass framebuffers (more than one render pass). Converts an attachment to an input. Make sure to also supply it properly in the [RDUniform](class_rduniform.md) for the uniform set.

**Note:** The returned array is *copied* and any changes to it will not update the original property value. See [PackedInt32Array](class_packedint32array.md) for more details.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_RDFramebufferPass_property_preserve_attachments"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[PackedInt32Array](class_packedint32array.md) **preserve_attachments** = `PackedInt32Array()` [ðŸ”—](#class_RDFramebufferPass_property_preserve_attachments)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_preserve_attachments**\ (\ value\: [PackedInt32Array](class_packedint32array.md)\ )
- [PackedInt32Array](class_packedint32array.md) **get_preserve_attachments**\ (\ )

Attachments to preserve in this pass (otherwise they are erased).

**Note:** The returned array is *copied* and any changes to it will not update the original property value. See [PackedInt32Array](class_packedint32array.md) for more details.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_RDFramebufferPass_property_resolve_attachments"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[PackedInt32Array](class_packedint32array.md) **resolve_attachments** = `PackedInt32Array()` [ðŸ”—](#class_RDFramebufferPass_property_resolve_attachments)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_resolve_attachments**\ (\ value\: [PackedInt32Array](class_packedint32array.md)\ )
- [PackedInt32Array](class_packedint32array.md) **get_resolve_attachments**\ (\ )

If the color attachments are multisampled, non-multisampled resolve attachments can be provided.

**Note:** The returned array is *copied* and any changes to it will not update the original property value. See [PackedInt32Array](class_packedint32array.md) for more details.
